remarks: The composition of two group homomorphisms is a group homomorphism. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 1-Dec-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
statement: ghomco $p |- ( ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp /\ K e. GrpOp ) /\ ( S e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) /\ T e. ( H GrpOpHom K ) ) ) -> ( T o. S ) e. ( G GrpOpHom K ) ) $.
